import React from 'react' function AdminDetails(props) { useEffect(() => { Axios.get('https://localhost:3001/get').then(response => { props.setRecipeList(response.data) }); }, [props.setRecipeList]) return ( <>

Recipes Uploades

  • ID
    Recipe Name
    Ingredients
    Procedures
    • <> {props.List.map((val, key) => (
  • {val.Id}
    {val.recipeName}
    {val.Ingredients}
    {val.Recipe}
    • ))}
) } export default AdminDetails
